item.description: These local hikes are shorter everyday events to help us get and stay in condition for the more strenuous events. Since I live on the Connecticut River, my afternoon hikes will be scheduled in the Sunapee/Upper Valley/Dartmouth region. Frequent Hikes that can be done after work on nice days. Take out a nibble of the Appalachian Trail or a local peak, unwind with a hike and burn a few C's. This event will be too far from many, so hopefully this will give you an idea to post your own ideas for your local area and help you find a hiking partner. We will decide on what day is best and email each other and set up text communications in case the Boss wont let you leave yet. Sometimes it just takes a nudge to get us out of the house- have the day pack ready and have a nice time, Our first hike is already scheduled.
item.name: Afternoon Short Hike
